column4: I've got a copy of the live cd 6.06 from which you can install ubuntu. However it keeps stalling. Is there a way of installing from the command line and not the live ubuntu?
- sadly, i don't have any other CD's.... is there are way of getting the live on to work like the other wone?
if it's stalling, it probably means something wrong with the CD... do you have the iso image so that you can burn a new CD?
